# SamperaLabs

> AI integration specialist portfolio and blog built with Astro, React, and SQLite.

SamperaLabs is the personal website of Bernat Sampera, featuring a portfolio of AI integration projects, a database-driven blog with admin panel, and service pages. The site is server-rendered with Astro 5 using a Node.js adapter, styled with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI, and uses SQLite for content storage.

## Frontend

- [src/docs/llms.txt](src/docs/llms.txt): Astro frontend application — pages, components, layouts, utilities, and integrations

## Database

- [db/llms.txt](db/llms.txt): SQLite data layer — schema, application queries, and sync scripts

## Scripts

- [scripts/](scripts/): Build and maintenance scripts including SQLite sync and sitemap generation

## Configuration

- [astro.config.mjs](astro.config.mjs): Astro configuration with SSR, Tailwind, MDX, React, and compression integrations
- [tailwind.config.cjs](tailwind.config.cjs): Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI theme configuration
- [src/config.yaml](src/config.yaml): Site metadata, SEO defaults, and UI theme settings
- [package.json](package.json): Dependencies and npm scripts
